title._content: [Portrait of Miquelito Valdez, New York, N.Y., between 1946 and 1948] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Miquelito Valdez, New York, N.Y., between 1946 and 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 327 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Valdez, Miquelito Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Latin jazz--1940-1950. Percussionists--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
